name: HeaderSend
short: Do you have trouble reading responses sent by the bot? How about we make them bigger?
description: Do you have sight problems? This may help! It will make the bot send all text using the markdown headers with this great cog!
install_msg: Thanks for installing HeaderSend. Hope it helps you manage with your sight problems.
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
